intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the process of getting started with GDA

item.title: Open the Object Viewer perspective
item.description:
If you're not already in the Object Viewer perspective, in the main menu select Window > Open Perspective > Object Viewer Perspective.
If you are already in the Object Viewer perspective, this step will have no effect in the IDE.

item.title: Expand the Object Tree
item.description: Click on the + besides 'All Objects' to expand the list of objects.

item.title: Examine Scannable Objects
item.description:
Scroll the list of object categories until you find the Scannable objects.
Expand the list of scannable objects.

item.title: View Scannable Properties
item.description:
Select an item under the list of scannable objects.
Note the properties for this item will be displayed in the Properties view

item.title: Success
item.description:
Congratulations!
You have completed the GDA Quickstart tutorial .
